resources.string: Have a taste of Japan\'s home box meal. Featuring sushi with smoked salmon, avocado and carrots, with the rice seasoned in sunflower seeds and soy sauce! In another section, we have broccoli and freshly cooked chicken, also covered in soy sauce. Have a taste of Japan\'s fried shrimps, complemented with a side of Japanese styled salad!

Taste the power of the dragon sushi! Features sticky rice, seaweed, smoked salmon, sesame seeds and carrots. Each piece of sushi is topped with freshly cut avocado, while the head has finely sliced avocadoes delicately put together.
A spicy and yet sour taste, this soup will be sure to provide an extremely spicy taste. Yet, it has rich flavours.
Enjoy shopping for food from the comfort of your own home! This is MahShop.
Thanks for using my shopping application!
